# rollup-plugin-clear-directory

Clear the directory of output.


## Installation

```bash
npm install --save-dev rollup-plugin-clear-directory
```


## Usage


```js
// rollup.config.js
import clearDirectory from 'rollup-plugin-clear-directory';

export default {
  // ...
  plugins: [
    clearDirectory({
      targets: ['dist']
    })
  ]
};
```
